We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private WilderSwingIndex _si;
// In Initialize()
_si = SI(symbol, limitMove);

// In OnData()
if (_si.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Is Ready", _si.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Warm Up Period", _si.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Current", _si.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Name", _si.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Samples", _si.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.si = self.SI(symbol, limitMove)

# In OnData()
if self.si.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Is Ready", self.si.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Warm Up Period", self.si.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Current", self.si.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Name", self.si.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Samples", self.si.Samples);
